alert.note: Alert for Wibaux (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 27 at 6:06PM MDT until May 27 at 6:45PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of northeast Montana, including the following county, Wibaux. * WHEN...Until 915 PM MDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 603 PM MDT, A trained weather spotters reported heavy rain in the advisory area due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. Between 0.5 and 1 inch of rain has fallen. Further storms to the south may provide additional heavy rainfall. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Wibaux, Carlyle, Saint Phillip and Yates. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
